original_text: Even after all these things had happened, Job still did not do anything bad. He did not say that God had done something wrong to him.
korean_text: 이 모든 일에 욥이 범죄하지 아니하고 하나님을 향하여 원망하지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: Even after all these things had happened
Job still did not do anything bad
sentences.korean_translation: 욥은 여전히 아무 나쁜 일도 하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: that God had done something wrong to him
